text: Maya Petrovna Belenkaya (; born 1 May 1931) is a former Soviet figure skater. With her partner Igor Moskvin, she became a three-time Soviet national champion from 1952 to 1954. In 1956, Belenkaya/Moskvin were sent to their first and only European Championships and finished 11th at the event in Paris. She was born in Saint Petersburg, Russia. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet figure skaters Category:Sportspeople from Saint Petersburg
title: Maya Belenkaya
